channel.title: 639] Can someone explain this line of code?
channel.description: Ok well I am trying to edit the slayer skill. First off in the section where the npc's to be assigned is located theres lines of code like this: [code] {"Rock Crab", 1, r.nextInt(60), r.nextInt(80), 8.0},[/code] I know the Rock Crab part is where you put the NPC name and it will be assigned. Can someone explain what the rest of the code is? Like the 1, and the nextInt(60)/nextInt(80) please?
